title: Nothing Phone (3) spotted on Geekbench ahead of launch
description: The highly anticipated Nothing Phone (3) has now appeared on Geekbench ahead of its July 1 unveiling. The latest listing shows the device managed respectable 2,076 single-core and 6,577 multi-core scores, and it is armed with Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 chipset as expected. Nothing Phone (3) Geekbench scorecard The listing also shows Phone (3) is equipped with 16GB RAM and it boots Android 15, presumably with Nothing OS 3.5 on top. As per the most recent leaks, Nothing Phone (3) should launch with a 6.7-inch LTPO OLED, a 5,150 mAh battery with 100W charging and four 50MP...
excerpt: Phone (3) is set to launch next week. The highly anticipated Nothing Phone (3) has now appeared on Geekbench ahead of its July 1 unveiling. The latest...
text: The highly anticipated Nothing Phone (3) has now appeared on Geekbench ahead of its July 1 unveiling. The latest listing shows the device managed respectable 2,076 single-core and 6,577 multi-core scores, and it is armed with Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 chipset as expected. Nothing Phone (3) Geekbench scorecard The listing also shows Phone (3) is equipped with 16GB RAM and it boots Android 15, presumably with Nothing OS 3.5 on top. As per the most recent leaks, Nothing Phone (3) should launch with a 6.7-inch LTPO OLED, a 5,150 mAh battery with 100W charging and four 50MP cameras, including a front-facing module, a main, 3x zoom periscope and ultrawide shooters. Source
html:
The highly anticipated Nothing Phone (3) has now appeared on Geekbench ahead of its July 1 unveiling. The latest listing shows the device managed respectable 2,076 single-core and 6,577 multi-core scores, and it is armed with Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 chipset as expected.


Nothing Phone (3) Geekbench scorecard

The listing also shows Phone (3) is equipped with 16GB RAM and it boots Android 15, presumably with Nothing OS 3.5 on top. As per the most recent leaks, Nothing Phone (3) should launch with a 6.7-inch LTPO OLED, a 5,150 mAh battery with 100W charging and four 50MP cameras, including a front-facing module, a main, 3x zoom periscope and ultrawide shooters.

Source
